plot: It's a new chapter for the Kardashian sisters as Khloé and Kourtney take over Miami for the summer! As the girls get situated in their new posh surroundings, they must also learn to balance business and pleasure as they prepare to open their new Dash store in only four days. But when Kim flies out to help, she and Khloé get into a big fight that could threaten the future of Dash. Meanwhile, Khloé's nerves start to get the best of her as she readies herself for the debut of her new late-night radio show. And after a night of partying, Khloé finds herself in an awkward situation after she makes out with her cute co-host.—Guilherme O.
